CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...4. Radio Station WHOD displayed the products of several of their advertisers in their booth. Mary Dee (shown here) and Mal Goode, did a nightly broadcast from the booth...Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Mal Goode holding bottle of Adair port wine in radio station WHOD booth with ads including PET milk and  Philip Morris, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Goode, Mal, 1908-1995.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
